name: Moosleite
description: Our house is situated approx. 1.5km from Mayrhofen, at the edge of the forest and enjoying wonderful panoramic views. The ski and village bus stop can be found a few minutes walk away from the house, from where one can access the surrounding villages and mountain lifts. A beautiful cycle path is close by, which leads along the Ziller Promenade.
Price includes: Heating, water, electricity, bed and table linen, towels and car park, a final cleaning charge.

Check in: 14,00hr, Check out: 9.00hr.
Directions: Use the B169 to Mayrhofen, and just before Mayrhofen turn right towards the "Horbergbahn", and drive towards Burgstall, opposite the SIDAN guest house turn right in the direction of the forest, and in a few metres you will arrive at our house.

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower, toilet
makesOffer.description:
The recently renovated holiday apartment can be found on the ground floor and consists of a double bedroom (with space for a cot or an additional camp bed) and a pleasant lounge/kitchen with a spacious sleeping area. 1 bathroom The kitchen is fully equipped, including a fridge, electric oven and crockery etc. Bed linen and towels are also available.
The apartment also has an entrance hall with cloakroom, shower/WC Sat-TV as well as it's own terrace.
A bread delivery service will bring you fresh bread each day to your door.
